Package crew

Class CrewMember

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.Observable
      • crew.CrewMember
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Engineer, Investor, Medic, Robot, Scientist, Student
    public class CrewMember
extends Observable
    class containing information about and methods to affect the state of a crew member.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      CrewMember​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String title)
      Default constructor sets crew member attributes to default values.
      CrewMember​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String title, int maxHealth, int maxFullness, int maxRestedness, int maxActionPoints)
      Extended constructor allows custom values for crew member attributes.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CrewMember

        public CrewMember​(java.lang.String name,
                  java.lang.String title)
        Default constructor sets crew member attributes to default values.
        Parameters:
        name - crewmember's name
        title - describes the vanity title

      • CrewMember

        public CrewMember​(java.lang.String name,
                  java.lang.String title,
                  int maxHealth,
                  int maxFullness,
                  int maxRestedness,
                  int maxActionPoints)
        Extended constructor allows custom values for crew member attributes.
        Parameters:
        name - crewmember's name
        title - describes the vanity title
        maxHealth - non negative maximum health value
        maxFullness - maximum fullness
        maxRestedness - maximum restedness
        maxActionPoints - maximum actions points

        Returns:
        the crew member's max fullness as an integer

      • setFullness

        public void setFullness​(int fullness)
        Sets fullness with range 0 to maxFullness. If fullness is then below HUNGER_THRESHOLD the effect HUNGRY is applied to crew member.
        Parameters:
        fullness - The new fullness value

      • changeFullness

        public void changeFullness​(int amount)

      • getRestedness

        public int getRestedness()
        returns the CrewMember's current restedness.
        Returns:
        the crew member's current restedness as an integer

      • getMaxRestedness

        public int getMaxRestedness()
        returns the CrewMember's max restedness.
        Returns:
        the crew member's max restedness as an integer

      • setRestedness

        public void setRestedness​(int restedness)
        Sets restedness with range 0 to maxRestedness. If restedness is then below TIRED_THRESHOLD the effect TIRED is applied to crew member.
        Parameters:
        restedness - The new restedness value.

      • changeRestedness

        public void changeRestedness​(int amount)
        change the CrewMember's restedness by a given amount.
        Parameters:
        amount - the amount to change the CrewMember's restedness by

      • getActionPoints

        public int getActionPoints()
        returns the CrewMember's current action points.
        Returns:
        the crew member's current action points as an integer

        public int getMaxActionPoints()
        returns the CrewMember's max action points.
        Returns:
        the crew member's max action points as an integer

      • useItem

        public void useItem​(ConsumableItem item)
        Activates items effects on the crew member.
        Parameters:
        item - activated item

      • repairShip

        public void repairShip​(Ship ship)
        Restores DEFAULT_SHIP_REPAIR to ships shield.
        Parameters:
        ship - to be affected.

      • sleep

        public void sleep()
        Restores DEFAULT_SLEEP_RESTORE if has actions available.

      • resetActions

        public void resetActions()
        Resets actions back to maximum value.

      • useAction

        public void useAction()
        reduces action points by one.

      • hasEffect

        public boolean hasEffect​(CrewMemberEffect effect)
        checks if a crew member is currently being affected by a given effect.
        Parameters:
        effect - the effect to check the crew member for
        Returns:
        true if the crew member has the given effect, false otherwise

      • addEffect

        public void addEffect​(CrewMemberEffect effect)
        adds a CrewMemberEffect to the crew member.
        Parameters:
        effect - the effect to add

      • removeEffect

        public void removeEffect​(CrewMemberEffect effect)
        removes an active CrewMemberEffect from the crew member.
        Parameters:
        effect - the active effect to remove

      • isDead

        public boolean isDead()
        returns True if the CrewMember is dead.
        Returns:
        wether the CrewMember is dead

      • canAct

        public boolean canAct()
        returns whether the CrewMember has an action point remaining.
        Returns:
        True if the CrewMember has at least one action point remaining.

      • canAct

        public boolean canAct​(int actionPoints)
        returns whether the CrewMember has the given number of action points remaining.
        Parameters:
        actionPoints - the number of action points to check for.
        Returns:
        True if the CrewMember has at least actionPoints action points remaining.

      • applyStartBonuses

        public void applyStartBonuses​(CrewState crewState)
        applies the starting bonuses given by a crew member.
        Parameters:
        crewState - the CrewState object to apply the effects to

      • applyDayStartEffects

        public void applyDayStartEffects()
        Applies new day start effects. By default this is stat changes by different effects. However this can be overloaded to include custom character effects.
